revised_title: Improvements in the Measurement of Rotatory Dispersive Power in the Visible and Ultra-violet Regions of the Spectrum
tldr: The author presents improvements to the method of determining rotatory dispersive power, allowing for accurate measurements in the visible and ultra-violet regions of the spectrum. The new method utilizes monochromatic or multi-chromatic light and a spectroscope-eyepiece to purify the light, enabling the use of various line spectra for polarimetric measurements.
